title: Flag of Portugal
cardDescription: The Flag of Portugal is the national flag of the Portuguese Republic. It is a rectangular bi-color with a field unevenly divided into green on the hoist, and red on the fly.
description: The Flag of Portugal is the national flag of the Portuguese Republic. It is a rectangular bi-color with a field unevenly divided into green on the hoist, and red on the fly. The lesser version of the national coat of arms is centered over the color boundary at equal distance from the upper and lower edges.

content.content: This pattern is worked vertically starting from bottom left..

content: With A, ch 19, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, sc 3, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sac, sc 1, [sca, sac] x 2, sca, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sac, sc 2, sca, sac, sc 1, sca, sac, sca, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sac, sca, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, scb, sbc, sca, sac, sca, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sac, sca, sab, sbd, sde, sed, sde, seb, sba, sac, sca, sc 3, sab, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sbc, scb, sc 1, sbd, sde, sed, sde, seb, sc 1, sbc, scb, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, [sbc, scb] x 2, sc 1, [sbc, scb] x 3, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sac, sc 2, sca, sac, sc 1, sca, sac, sca, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sac, sc 1, [sca, sac] x 2, sca, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, sc 3, sca, sc 7, turn
